Actions.Name: Spore
Actions.Description: The [name] puts down two terrain effects in free spaces in range. Characters that pass through these spaces gain spore infestation, with the following effects:

ListedItems.Description: While they have the infestation, they are sealed+.

When a character with a spore infestation is defeated, they release an explosion around them, dealing [D]+[fray] as a medium blast area effect centered on them and pacifying all characters within. Pacified characters take maximum damage.
Spore infestation can be removed if a character is cured, instead of any other of cure's regular effects.

Actions.Name: Puppet
Actions.Description: A character with spore infestation is shoved 3 spaces in a direction of the [name]'s choosing, then may deal [fray] damage to an adjacent character of the [name]'s choice.

Actions.Name: Detonate Thrall
Actions.Description: Any number of characters with spore infestation explode as if defeated, ending the infestation.
